attributes.action: BRITISH MUSLIMS request the BAN all EX M.A.C (Muslims Against Crusaders) due to insighting HATE.against non-Muslims
attributes.additional_details: BRITISH MUSLIMS request the BAN all EX M.A.C (Muslims Against Crusaders) members Anjem Choudary, Trevor Brooks, Abu Assadullah, Anthony Small, Jordan, Haroon and all affiliated members from any involvement or appearances in media, protesting, speechs and alike due to the grounds of insighting HATE.
